metadata.title: CVE-2023-46001 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in gpac MP4Boxv.2.3-DEV-rev573-g201320819-master allows a local attacker to cause adenial of service via the gpac/src/isomedia/isom_read.c:2807:51 function ingf_isom_get_user_data.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
